channel.title: Desserts on The Recipe Book
channel.description: Recent content in Desserts on The Recipe Book

item.title: Chewy Chocolate Chip Cookies
item.description: These are keto friendly INGREDIENTS: 1/2 cup Coconut flour 1/3 cup brown sugar 1/4 TSP baking soda 1/4 TSP salt 3 large eggs 1/3 cup butter melted and then cooled 1 tsp vanilla extract 1/2 cup heaping Chocolate chips INSTRUCTIONS: Preheat oven to 350 F Grease Cookie sheet Combine dry ingredients add wet ingredients mix till it makes a dough bake 12-14 minutes

item.title: Keto Muffins
item.description: INGREDIENTS: 1 Cup almond flour or 1/4 cup Coconut flour 1/2 cup heavy cream 1 large egg 1/4 blueberries or raspberries 1/4 cup keto sweetener of choice 1/2 tsp baking powder 1/2 tsp vanilla extract 1/4 tsp lemon juice 2 tablespoons of butter INSTRUCTIONS: Preheat oven to 350F melt butter and whisk eggs mix all ingredients pour into baking cups bake 20-25 minutes until golden brown

item.title: Keto Mousse
item.description: How to make KETO Mousse INGREDIENTS: 1-1/2 cup heavy whipping cream 2-3 tbsp un-sweetened cocoa powder 3 tbsp KETO powder sugar (think swerve) 1 tsp vanilla extract pinch of salt INSTRUCTIONS: Combine all ingredients & whisk to whip to fluffy texture. Store in fridge.
